Package com.atakmap.android.radiolibrary

Class HarrisRadio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.radiolibrary.HarrisRadio
  • public class HarrisRadio
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a valid harris radio, it's USB device ID as well as all tty ACM ports associated with the device. Has the ability to query the radio for basic preset info.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ACTION
      Intent action for USB permissions

      int getLastPort()
      Gets the last detected serial port, because that is what was originally happening with the removed findDevNode method in ControllerPppd

      • getDeviceId

        public int getDeviceId()
        Gets the Device ID from the USB Manager
        Returns:
        the Device ID

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission()
        Determines whether or not this radio has USB device permission.
        Returns:
        True if you can access this USB device, false otherwise.

      • requestPermission

        public void requestPermission​(java.lang.String action)
        Requests access to the USB device associated with this radio
        Parameters:
        action - The android callback action for the intent.

      • valuesQueriedAndSet

        public boolean valuesQueriedAndSet()
        Determines whether or not the radio has been queried and the values have been set.
        Returns:
        True if the values have been set, false otherwise.

      • addTtyAcmPort

        public void addTtyAcmPort​(int port)
        Adds a tty ACM port number if not already added
        Parameters:
        port - the port number to add

      • getLastPort

        public int getLastPort()
        Gets the last detected serial port, because that is what was originally happening with the removed findDevNode method in ControllerPppd
        Returns:
        The last port of all the ports associated with this radio.

      • queryAndSet

        public boolean queryAndSet()
        Queries the radio for basic present info, and sets the radio's fields.
        Returns:
        True if success, false if doesn't have permissions or not successful.
